text: Any advice on getting logging working from with an @distributed for loop? I’ve tried just putting @infos inside the loop but I’m not getting anything out in the worker log files (I’m using CluterManagers.jl) or the main slurm log file

elements.text: Any advice on getting logging working from with an @distributed for loop? I’ve tried just putting @infos inside the loop but I’m not getting anything out in the worker log files (I’m using CluterManagers.jl) or the main slurm log file

text: Try `Core.println`, it prints directly to the head-worker stream, so it often works most reliably
